power.title: Call Forth the Spirit Pack
power.fluff: Spectral wolves leap forth to knock your enemies down

section.name: Attack:
section.target: one, two, or three creatures in the burst
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.
If the target is marked by one of your allies, it takes an extra +1d6 damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is adjacent to one of your allies, it is knocked prone.

power.title: Close the Kill
power.fluff: This close to the kill, your instincts take cover

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude
If the target is bloodied, you have combat advantage for the attack

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d10 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Primal Predator:
section.text: If the target is bloodied, you deal additional damage equal to your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If the target is either bloodied or reduced to 0 or fewer hit points, one ally within 5 squares of you gains temporary hit points equal to your level.

section.name: Primal Guardian:
section.text: Increase the temporary hit points by your Constitution modifier.

power.title: Cull the Herd
power.fluff: Your feral glare rends your foe's mind with a sense of doom and drags that foe toward your claws
power.keyword: Beast Form, Charm, Implement, Primal, Psychic

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Will

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d8 + Wisdom modifier psychic damage, and you pull the target 3 squares.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: You pull the target half the distance.

power.title: Darting Bite
power.fluff: With quickness and cunning, you bite your enemies and dodge to avoid a counterattack

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You shift up to 2 squares.

section.name: Primal Predator:
section.text: Up to a number of squares equal to 2 + one-half your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.
If you target only one creature, the damage is 2d6 + Wisdom modifier instead and the target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: If you hit at least one target, you can shift up to 2 squares.

section.name: Primal Predator:
section.text: Up to a number of squares equal to 1 + your Dexterity modifier (minimum 2 squares).

power.title: Frost Flash
power.fluff: You blast your enemy with a cold that leaves it frozen in place

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier cold damage, and the target is immobilized until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Primal Guardian:
section.text: The target also takes a penalty to damage rolls while it remains immobilized. The penalty equals one-half your Constitution modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The target is slowed until the end of your next turn.

power.title: Gust of Wind
power.fluff: A blast of air buffets nearby creatures, hurling them backwards as it drives them to the ground

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d12 + Wisdom modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You push the target up to 2 squares.

power.title: Insect Swarm
power.fluff: A buzzing drone fills the air as a heavy cloud of insects swirls around you

section.name: Attack:
section.target: each creature other than you in the burst, including in your space
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Primal Swarm:
section.text: You can use this power as a Close wave 3 instead, targing creatures in the wave.

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The area creates a a zone of swarming insects until the end of your next turn.
The zone is lightly obscured to your enemies.

power.title: Scattered Form
power.fluff: Your form scatters into a horde of insects to attack nearby creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 2d6 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: You take half damage from the first melee attack or ranged attack that damages you before the end of your next turn.

section.name: Primal Swarm:
section.text: You take half damage from all melee and ranged attacks that damage you before the end of your next turn. Apply this after the reduction from your Primal Swarm class feature.

power.title: Stinging Cloud
power.fluff: You call forth a cloud of insects to sting and poison your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d10 + Wisdom modifier poison damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The area creates a zone of stinging insects until the end of your next turn.
Any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes poison damage equal to 2 + your Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Primal Swarm:
section.text: The zone does not affect your allies.

power.title: Thorn Spray
power.fluff: You release a blast of thorns that puncture your foes

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d6 + Wisdom modifier damage, and the target takes a -2 penalty to all defenses until the end of your next turn.

section.name: Primal Predator:
section.text: The penalty equals 2 + one-half your Dexterity modifier.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: The penalty only applies to the first attack before the end of your next turn.

power.title: Twisting Vines
power.fluff: Vines and roots erupt from the ground around nearby creatures

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Reflex

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: For each target, choose either the target's space or the spaces adjacent to its space.
The chosen squares become difficult terrain until the end of the encounter.

power.title: Wall of Flames
power.fluff: The ground blackens and bright flames rise in a roiling wall that shrouds the battlefield

section.name: Attack:
section.text: Wisdom vs. Fortitude

section.name: Hit:
section.text: 1d8 + Wisdom modifier fire damage, and you can slide the target 1 square.

section.name: Miss:
section.text: Wisdom modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus fire damage.

section.name: Effect:
section.text: The area creates a zone of flames until the end of your next turn.
The zone is lightly obscured, and any creature that ends its turn in the zone takes fire damage equal to your [Constitution or Dexterity] modifier + your implement's enhancement bonus.

section.name: Primarl Guardian:
section.text: Allies do not take the damage for ending their turn in the zone.
